definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: South African plant widely cultivated for its showy pure white spathe and yellow spadix.
sentences.chinese: 长有耀眼的纯白色苞和黄色纤维的一种南非种植植物。

sentences.english: With pure white as its interior color, pavilions have a colorful exterior appearance.
sentences.chinese: 展厅有着彩色的外表皮，内部色彩为纯白。

sentences.english: Hit B to select the Brush Tool and make sure the color is pure white.
sentences.chinese: 点击乙选择画笔工具，并确保颜色是纯白色。

sentences.english: Any text or graphics are acceptable at this stage, as long as they are pure white.
sentences.chinese: 只要是纯白色的，任何文字或图像都可以。

sentences.english: It is often more durable than wrapping paper, and it is plain white or buff.
sentences.chinese: 它经常是比包装纸更加耐用，它是纯白或浅黄色。

sentences.english: Eat a good meal, we walk in the white world, who do not speak.
sentences.chinese: 吃好饭，我们漫步在纯白的世界中，谁都没有说话。

sentences.english: The association of wedding ceremony is definitely romantic, pure-white and happy.
sentences.chinese: 想到婚礼，肯定是浪漫的，纯白的，幸福的。

sentences.english: Pure white icing soon became a wedding cake staple.
sentences.chinese: 纯白的糖霜成了婚礼蛋糕的主料。

sentences.english: The walls are white and the windows are big. There are two doors in the room.
sentences.chinese: 墙壁以纯白色配上大大的窗口，也有两扇门。

sentences.english: One of the seven treasure politicians, His body is pure white like a Heavenly Dragon.
sentences.chinese: 轮王七政宝之一，身色纯白无杂，犹如大龙。

sentences.english: And then I saw a pure white light.
sentences.chinese: 然后，我看到了一个纯白色的光。

sentences.english: Without reasons, I have ever loved pure colour, especially white dress.
sentences.chinese: 不知何故，自幼便酷爱净色，尤爱纯白色的服装。

sentences.english: The beaches were stunning, the sand was pure white and very clean.
sentences.chinese: 海滩令人惊讶的，沙是纯白色的，非常干净。

sentences.english: A pure white basket seems very classy.
sentences.chinese: 纯白的篮子看起来颇有质感。

sentences.english: ALL work must be manual and white hat techniques ONLY.
sentences.chinese: 所有工作都必须是手工和纯白色帽技术。

sentences.english: And, of course, there's the plain white T-shirt.

definition: simple and neat/quiet (colors)/unobtrusive/(of food) light/not greasy or strongly flavored
